en.We were not able to parse any campaigns:
We were not able to parse any campaigns from that pasted data.

Make sure its an exact copy of the text provided by the Backup feature of an Arkham Cards app.
en.The following campaigns will be ERASED::
The following campaigns will be ERASED: 
{{campaigns}}
en.This feature is intended for advanced di:
This feature is intended for advanced diagnostics or to import data from another app.

{{erasedCampaigns}}
This feature is intended for advanced diagnostics or if you are trying to move your campaign data from one device to another. Just copy the data and paste it into the other app.
en.Are you sure you want to sign out?: Are you sure you want to sign out?
en.Data on ArkhamDB will be preserved, but:
Data on ArkhamDB will be preserved, but all Campaign data and any edits made without internet might be lost.

 If you are having trouble with your account you can also reconnect.
en.Error: check for updated cards again: Error: check for updated cards again
en.After saving the scenario result, you ca: After saving the scenario result, you can use the "Upgrade Deck" buttons to award XP and adjust trauma for each investigator.
en.This deck contains several basic weaknes: This deck contains several basic weaknesses
en.This deck contains a basic weakness: This deck contains a basic weakness
en.Do you want to remove them from the camp: Do you want to remove them from the campaign’s Basic Weakness set?
en.Do you want to remove it from the campai: Do you want to remove it from the campaign’s Basic Weakness set?
en.Are you sure you want to remove {{invest: Are you sure you want to remove {{investigator}} from this campaign?
en.Campaign log data associated with them m: Campaign log data associated with them may be lost (but the deck will remain on ArkhamDB).
en.Too many copies of a card with the same: Too many copies of a card with the same name.
en.Contains forbidden cards (cards not perm: Contains forbidden cards (cards not permitted by Faction)
en.Doesn't comply with the Investigator req: Doesn't comply with the Investigator requirements.
en.Unfortunately to delete decks you have t: Unfortunately to delete decks you have to visit ArkhamDB at this time.
en.Title: Title
en.Name: Name
en.Note: This entry is crossed out: Note: This entry is crossed out
en.No Matching Weaknesses, try adjusting Tr: No Matching Weaknesses, try adjusting Trait filter.
en.Return to the Night of the Zealot: Return to the Night of the Zealot
en.Include all basic weaknesses from these: Include all basic weaknesses from these expansions
en.You can use this app to keep track of ca:
You can use this app to keep track of campaigns, including investigator trauma, the chaos bag, basic weaknesses, campaign notes and the experience values for all of your ArkhamDB decks.

Please sign in to enable this feature.
en.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site:
ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site where you can manage your decks and share them with others. If you have an account, you can use this app to create and manage your decks on the go.

Please sign in to enable this feature.
en.NAME: NAME
en.Make a copy of a deck so that you can us: Make a copy of a deck so that you can use it in a different campaign or choose different upgrades.
en.No campaigns yet.\n\nUse the + button to:
No campaigns yet.

Use the + button to create a new one.
en.No decks yet.\n\nUse the + button to cre:
No decks yet.

Use the + button to create a new one.
en.An unexpected error occurred ({{error}}): An unexpected error occurred ({{error}}). If restarting the app doesn't fix the problem, tap here to reauthorize.
en.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site: ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site where you can manage and share decks with others. Sign in to access your decks.
en.We are having trouble talking to ArkhamD:
We are having trouble talking to ArkhamDB.

If the problem persists, please try to reauthorize.
en.Are you sure you want to delete the camp: Are you sure you want to delete the campaign: {{campaignName}}
en.No campaigns yet.\n\nUse the + button to:
No campaigns yet.

Use the + button to create a new one.

You can use this app to keep track of campaigns, including investigator trauma, the chaos bag, basic weaknesses, campaign notes and the experience values for all decks.
en.It has been more than a week since you c:
It has been more than a week since you checked for new cards.
Check for new cards from ArkhamDB?
en.You seem to be offline. Refresh Network?: You seem to be offline. Refresh Network?
en.Are you sure you want to delete this dec: Are you sure you want to delete this deck?
en.Please save any local edits to this deck: Please save any local edits to this deck before sharing to ArkhamDB
en.This deck contains next/previous version: This deck contains next/previous versions with upgrades, so we cannot upload it to ArkhamDB at this time. If you would like to upload it, please make a 'copy' first.
en.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site:
ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site where you can manage and share decks with others.

Sign in to access your decks or share decks you have created with others.
en.You can upload your deck to ArkhamDB to:
You can upload your deck to ArkhamDB to share with others.

After doing this you will need network access to make changes to the deck.
en.It looks like you deleted this deck from:
It looks like you deleted this deck from ArkhamDB.

 If it was part of a campaign you can add the same investigator back to restore your campaign data.
en.Looks like you have made some changes th: Looks like you have made some changes that have not been saved.
en.Mark all packs in the {{packName}} cycle: Mark all packs in the {{packName}} cycle?
en.Clear all packs in the {{packName}} cycl: Clear all packs in the {{packName}} cycle?
en.This deck contains next/previous version: This deck contains next/previous versions with upgrades, so we cannot upload it to ArkhamDB at this time. If you would like to upload it, you can use Copy to upload a clone of the current deck.
en.Return to The House Always Wins: Return to The House Always Wins
en.Return to Blood on the Altar: Return to Blood on the Altar
en.Return to Lost in Time and Space: Return to Lost in Time and Space
en.Prologue: Disappearance at the Twilight: Prologue: Disappearance at the Twilight Estate

en.Up by 5, hope I don't draw the tentacle: Up by 5, hope I don't draw the tentacle
en.This deck does not seem to be part of a:
This deck does not seem to be part of a campaign yet.

If you add this deck to a campaign, the app can keep track of the available weaknesses between multiple decks.

Otherwise, you can draw random weaknesses from your entire collection.
en.DO NOT COUNT TOWARDS DECK SIZE: DO NOT COUNT TOWARDS DECK SIZE
en.There are no weaknesses that match these:
There are no weaknesses that match these trait filters left in the set.

Please adjust the trait filter.

es.This feature is intended for advanced di:
Esta funcionalidad está diseñada para diagnósticos avanzados o para importar datos desde otra App.

{{erasedCampaigns}}
Esta funcionalidad está diseñada para diagnósticos avanzados o si estás intentando mover tus datos de campaña desde un dispositivo a otro. Solamente copia los datos y pégalos en la otra app.
es.Data on ArkhamDB will be preserved, but:
Los Datos en ArkhamDB no se modificarán, pero todos los Datos de Campaña y cualquier edición realizada sin internet podría perderse.

 Si tienes problemas con tu cuenta también te puedes reconectar.
es.Error: check for updated cards again: Error: Comprobar actualizaciones de cartas nuevamente
es.After saving the scenario result, you ca: Después de guardar el resultado del escenario, puedes usar los botones de "Mejorar Mazo" para asignar puntos de experiencia y ajustar el trauma de cada investigador.

es.This deck contains a basic weakness: Este mazo contiene una debilidad básica

es.Contains forbidden cards (cards not perm: Contiene cartas prohibidas (cartas no permitidas por Clase)

es.Title: Título
es.Name: Nombre

Todas las debilidades han sido robadas.
es.Lost in Time and Space: Perdidos en el tiempo y el espacio
es.Return to the Midnight Masks: Regreso a Las máscaras de medianoche

es.Return to the Night of the Zealot: Regreso a La Noche de la Fanática

es.You can use this app to keep track of ca:
Puedes usar esta aplicación para hacer seguimiento de campañas, incluyendo el trauma de investigadores, la bolsa del caos, las debilidades básicas, las notas de campaña y los valores de experiencia para todos tus mazos de ArkhamDB.

Por favor, inicia sesión para activar esta función.
es.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site:
ArkhamDB es un sitio popular de construcción de mazos donde puedes gestionar tus mazos y compartirlos con otros. Si tienes una cuenta, puedes usar esta aplicación para crear y administrar tus mazos en cualquier lugar.

Por favor, inicia sesión para activar esta función.
es.NAME: NOMBRE
es.SELECT DECK VERSION TO COPY: ELIGE VERSIÓN DE MAZO A COPIAR
es.Make a copy of a deck so that you can us: Haz una copia de un mazo para que puedas usarlo en una campaña diferente o elegir diferentes mejoras.
es.No matching campaigns for \"{{searchTerm: No se encontraron campañas buscando por "{{searchTerm}}".
es.No campaigns yet.\n\nUse the + button to:
No hay campañas todavía.

Utiliza el botón + para crear una nueva.
es.No decks yet.\n\nUse the + button to cre:
No hay mazos todavía.

Utiliza el botón + para crear uno nuevo.
es.No matching decks for \"{{searchTerm}}\": No se encontraron mazos buscando por "{{searchTerm}}".
es.No matching investigators for \"{{search: No se encontraron investigadores buscando por "{{searchTerm}}".
es.An unexpected error occurred ({{error}}): Ocurrió un error inesperado ({{error}}). Si reiniciar la aplicación no soluciona el problema, pulse aquí para volver a autorizar.
es.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site: ArkhamDB es un sitio popular de construcción de mazos donde usted puede gestionar y compartir mazos con otros. Inicie sesión para acceder a sus mazos.
es.We are having trouble talking to ArkhamD:
Estamos teniendo problemas para comunicarnos con ArkhamDB.

Si el problema persiste, por favor trate de volver a autorizar.
es.Are you sure you want to delete the camp: Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar la campaña: {{campaignName}}
es.No campaigns yet.\n\nUse the + button to:
No hay campañas todavía.

Utiliza el botón + para crear una nueva.

Puedes usar esta aplicación para hacer seguimiento de campañas, incluyendo el trauma de investigadores, la bolsa del caos, las debilidades básicas, las notas de campaña y los valores de experiencia para todos tus mazos.
es.Only Show Previous Campaign Members: Solo Mostrar Miembros de Campañas Anteriores
es.It has been more than a week since you c:
Ha pasado más de una semana desde que buscaste nuevas cartas.
¿Comprobar si hay nuevas cartas en ArkhamDB?
es.Are you sure you want to delete this dec: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este mazo?
es.Please save any local edits to this deck: Por favor, guarde las modificaciones locales en este mazo antes de compartirlas en ArkhamDB.
es.This deck contains next/previous version: Este mazo contiene versiones anteriores/posteriores con actualizaciones, por lo que no podemos subirlo a ArkhamDB en este momento. Si deseas subirlo, por favor haz una 'copia' primero.
es.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site:
ArkhamDB es un sitio popular de construcción de mazos donde puedes gestionar y compartir mazos con otros.

Inicia sesión para acceder a tus mazos o compartir los mazos que has creado con otros.
es.You can upload your deck to ArkhamDB to:
Puedes subir tu mazo a ArkhamDB para compartirlo con otros.

Después de hacer esto, necesitarás acceso a la red para hacer cambios al mazo.
es.It looks like you deleted this deck from:
Parece que has eliminado este mazo de ArkhamDB.

 Si era parte de una campaña, puedes agregar el mismo investigador de nuevo para restaurar los datos de tu campaña.
es.Looks like you have made some changes th: Parece que ha realizado algunos cambios que no se han guardado.
es.Mark all packs in the {{packName}} cycle: ¿Marcar todos los packs en el ciclo {{packName}}?

Nous n'avons pas été capable d'extraire des campages à partir des données collées.

Assurez-vous qu'il s'agit bien d'une copie exacte du texte fourni par la fonctionnalité de sauvegarde d'une application Arkham Cards.

Les campagnes suivantes vont être EFFACEES:

fr.Import and Erase Current Campaigns: Importer et effacer les campagnes en cours
fr.This feature is intended for advanced di: Cette fonctionnalité est destinée aux diagnostiques avancés ou si vous souhaitez déplacer vos données de campagne d'un appareil à un autre. Copier simplement les données et coller-les sur dans l'autre application.
fr.Are you sure you want to sign out?: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir vous déconnecter?
fr.Data on ArkhamDB will be preserved, but:
Les données sur ArkhamDB seront conservées, mais toutes les données des campagnes et toutes modifications faites hors connexion pourrait être perdues.

 Si vous avez des problèmes avec votre compte, vous pouvez également vous recconecter.
fr.Error: check for updated cards again: Erreur: nouvelle vérfication des cartes mises à jour
fr.Check for updated cards: Vérification des cartes mises à jour
fr.After saving the scenario result, you ca: Après avoir enregistré le résultat du scénario, vous pouvez utiliser le bouton "Améliorer Deck" afin de décerner l'XP et ajuster les traumas pour chaque investigateur.

fr.Campaign log data associated with them m: Les données du journal de campagne qui leur sont associées peuvent être perdues (mais les decks resteront sur ArkhamDB).
fr.Too many copies of a card with the same: Trop de copies d'une carte avec le même nom.
fr.Contains forbidden cards (cards not perm: Contient de cartes interdites (cartes non-autorisées par la Classe)
fr.Doesn't comply with the Investigator req: Ne satisfait pas les règles pour cet investigateur.
fr.Unfortunately to delete decks you have t: Malheureusement vous devez pour le moment vous rendre sur ArkhamDB pour supprimer des decks.

fr.You can use this app to keep track of ca:
You can use this app to keep track of campaigns, including investigator trauma, the chaos bag, basic weaknesses, campaign notes and the experience values for all of your ArkhamDB decks.

Please sign in to enable this feature.
fr.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site:
ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site where you can manage your decks and share them with others. If you have an account, you can use this app to create and manage your decks on the go.

Please sign in to enable this feature.

No campaigns yet.

Use the + button to create a new one.

No decks yet.

We are having trouble talking to ArkhamDB.

fr.Please save any local edits to this deck: Please save any local edits to this deck before sharing to ArkhamDB
fr.This deck contains next/previous version: This deck contains next/previous versions with upgrades, so we cannot upload it to ArkhamDB at this time. If you would like to upload it, please make a 'copy' first.
fr.ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site:
ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site where you can manage and share decks with others.

Sign in to access your decks or share decks you have created with others.
fr.You can upload your deck to ArkhamDB to:
You can upload your deck to ArkhamDB to share with others.

After doing this you will need network access to make changes to the deck.
fr.It looks like you deleted this deck from:
It looks like you deleted this deck from ArkhamDB.

 If it was part of a campaign you can add the same investigator back to restore your campaign data.
fr.Looks like you have made some changes th: Looks like you have made some changes that have not been saved.

Otherwise, you can draw random weaknesses from your entire collection.
